title: Trimming, 18th century
medium: Colored silk in uncut velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Band, under a crown, showing armorial devices above a double-headed eagle; in brown, yellow, and red on green ground with blue borders.

tombstone.epitaph:
